overview: A trip along the 1,300 km long Peninsula of Baja California in Mexico, in which we discover a mythological and magical land, with its own time and Characters. In this film the past, the present and the future are interwined to create a beautiful and unique symphony of the nature, the history and people of the Baja.

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad

tagline: In the end, we will conserve only what we love
title: An Island in the Continent
